titleStmt.title: Ars aulica or The courtiers arte
Arte aulica. English
titleStmt.author: Ducci, Lorenzo.
Blount, Edward, fl. 1588-1632, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Melch. Bradwood for Edward Blount,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Ducci, Lorenzo. Arte aulica.
The translation has been attributed to Edward Blount, who signs the dedication, but he may be no more than the publisher.
The first two leaves are blank except for signature-mark on A1r.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
